TEXT.TITLE: ANDREOTTI DROPS COALITION BID
TEXT.BODY: Veteran politician Giulio Andreotti abandoned his attempts to form a government, putting Italy on course for early elections, political sources said. Christian Democrat Andreotti told President Francesco Cossiga he was unable to reconstruct the five-party coalition after two weeks of negotiations, they said. Reuter
